Package Contents

class app.core.cache.backends.MemoryCacheBackend(max_size=1000, clean_interval=60)

Bases: app.core.cache.base.CacheBackend[T]

In-memory cache backend implementation.

This backend stores cached values in memory, with optional TTL expiration. It’s suitable for development and testing environments, or for small-scale production use where persistence is not required.

Parameters:

  • max_size (int)

  • clean_interval (int)

cache: Dict[str, Any]
expiry: Dict[str, float]
max_size = 1000
clean_interval = 60
lock
last_cleanup
async initialize()

Initialize the memory cache backend.

This is a no-op for the memory backend since it doesn’t require external connections, but implemented for interface consistency.

Return type:

None

async shutdown()

Shut down the memory cache backend.

Clears all cached data and performs cleanup.

Return type:

None

class app.core.cache.backends.NullCacheBackend

Bases: app.core.cache.base.CacheBackend[T]

No-op cache backend for testing or disabling cache.

This backend doesn’t actually store or retrieve any data. It simply provides the interface required by the CacheBackend protocol but performs no operations. Useful for testing or when caching needs to be disabled.

async initialize()

Initialize the null cache backend.

This is a no-op method that exists for interface consistency.

Return type:

None

async shutdown()

Shut down the null cache backend.

This is a no-op method that exists for interface consistency.

Return type:

None

async get(key, default=None)

Always return default value.

Args:

key: Cache key default: Default value to return

Returns:

Default value (always)

Parameters:

  • default (Optional[T])

Return type:

Optional[T]

No-op, always return success.

bool: Always True

class app.core.cache.backends.RedisCacheBackend(redis_url=None, serializer='pickle', prefix='cache:', **redis_options)

Bases: app.core.cache.base.CacheBackend[T]

Redis implementation of the cache backend.

Provides caching functionality using Redis as the storage backend.

Parameters:

  • redis_url (Optional[str])

  • serializer (str)

  • prefix (str)

  • redis_options (Any)

redis_url = 'redis://localhost:6379/0'
serializer = 'pickle'
prefix = 'cache:'
redis_options
client: redis.asyncio.Redis | None = None
async initialize()

Initialize the Redis connection.

This method establishes the Redis connection during application startup.

Return type:

None

async shutdown()

Close the Redis connection.

This method is called during application shutdown to properly close the Redis connection.

Return type:

None

async _get_client()

Get or create Redis client.

Returns:

Redis client

Return type:
